name: Lake Witch
description:
Made for MiniJam 79: Frogs

You play as the kind Lake Witch, ancient being, trying to preserve the beauty of the Nature.

Lately, lots of people visited your Lake. They were noisy and littering, so you turned them into frogs. 

But now your hex is wearing out, and you need to carefully hex frogmans (frog + humans) back to green quiet jumpers.
